Improvements.Improvement: Extract repeated code into a method
Improvements.Description: The code for adding checks to the EntityDictionary is repeated. This can be modularized into a separate method.

Improvements.Change_Diff:
- Map<String,Class<? extends Check>> checks=new HashMap<>();
+ Map<String,Class<? extends Check>> checks;
Improvements.Description: The HashMap for the checks is created and immediately overwritten. It's better to initialize it at the point of definition.
